reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional speaker
reviews.author: Lawrence Andrus
reviews.content: This speaker pairs easily and produces a rich sound for all music and crisp clear audio for talk and podcasts.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States August 3, 2024

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars UPDATE May 22, 2024
reviews.author: Frankie781
reviews.content: I bought the first one in January then after reading the reviews for pairing two MusiBaby speakers, I had to get another one. They paired up immediately, the sound quality is very good (for the price) and I really like the lanyard for carrying them around.No need to carry my android around when doing things around the house or working in the garage. Now I can listen to my play list anywhere I go in the house. The first time I answered a call on my phone I was in the garage with my phone connected to the speakers - It actually slipped my mind that they (speakers) were paired with my phone and was able to take the call and listen and speak as I walked around.There's a couple more features I want to try and afterwards I will update my review. So far everything is as advertised on Amazon. Good dealUPDATE to my original review - I found out when my speakers needed to be recharged that they have Micro USB Ports (old cell phone charging ports). They should have been fitted with the newer USB-C ports. I had to search for my old charging cables to recharge them.My excellent rating review went down because of this.Another update 5-22-2024I've had one MusiBaby speaker since January, I liked the first one, so I bought another one in February, to pair them.When it came time to charge, I noticed they had the older cell phone charging ports Micro USB (Type A) instead of the newer USB-C (has no up or down orientation). I found this annoying at first but after pairing them and listening to my playlists on them, decided it was no big deal. The quality of sound surpasses the charging port jacks.I did lose the ability to pair them on one speaker, after a few months of constant use, but after contacting their Customer Service, they quickly sent replacement.I also have to add that their customer service department is exceptional. They took a while to look at my original review, but they did respond promptly after.After all is said and done, I've updated my review to Five (5) Stars all around
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States February 16, 2024

reviews.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Became unable to charge.
reviews.author: Kindle Customer
reviews.content: This was a great little speaker for a few months of light use. Unfortunately, it will no longer charge. The lights inside flicker between blue and red while charging. Into the trash it goes. Waste of money!A zero on durability.Update: this company saw my review and reached out to me to offer a replacement speaker or refund!! I've never had that happen, have you?Sure enough, I asked for another speaker because it was a great little speaker and they sent another quickly! Thank you!
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States May 27, 2024
